tests performed, execution results, identified defects, and other critical aspects.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"According to ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://glossary.istqb.org/en_US/home"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"ISTQB report)","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" – this report provides an ongoing update on the status of testing activities and includes the status of test operations in comparison to a baseline.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Test completion report (or test summary report)","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" – this report is prepared at the conclusion of the testing phase and offers a comparison of the relevant test items with the exit criteria.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What is the objective of test report?","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The purpose of the test report is to provide a clear picture of how well the software meets the specified requirements and whether it is ready for release.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The test report helps to evaluate the overall health of the project and identify any critical defects.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It also acts as a historical record of the testing procedure that may be consulted for similar problems in the future or for audits and projects.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Why do we need test reports?","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This documentation is important for keeping everyone informed during the development process, especially in projects with multiple teams working together.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"By recording any risks found during testing, test reports ensure that everyone is aware of any problems that could affect the software's performance or usability before it is released. title.title: How to create test report with ReportPortal

leadParagraph.leadParagraph: As applications grow more complex, testing becomes increasingly important to ensure they meet quality standards. Central to the testing phase is the creation of test reports, which serve to inform stakeholders about test results, guide decision-making, and drive product improvements.

title.title: Reporting Cypress test results to ReportPortal

leadParagraph.leadParagraph: This is an article for people who runs tests using Cypress test framework and who wants to have better, deeper, prettier visibility on test results with ability to do AI-based defects triage and create test automation reports.

leadParagraph.leadParagraph: If the Playwright used on your project to write and run tests, the results can reach the ReportPortal via the agent-js-playwright. The agent is a custom Playwright reporter that sends test execution results to ReportPortal.
